means.word_mean: 1. having or concerned with polarities or contrasts;
2. marked by deliberate deceptiveness especially by pretending one set of feelings and acting under the influence of another;

sentences.sentence: "she was a deceitful scheming little thing"- Israel Zangwill
"a double-faced infernal traitor and schemer"- W.M.Thackeray

means.word_mean: 3. having two faces--one looking to the future and one to the past;
